e: ￹`Ma~`ngodo~ `cingra~ `to~ `mama~￺He is respectful to his father.￻他很孝順父親，他尊敬他的父親
￹`Ma~`ngodo~ `cingra~ `a~ `mi~`licay~.￺He is embarrassed to ask.￻他不好意思問
￹`Ma~`ngodo~ `cingra~ `to~ `nika~ `ci~`raraw~.￺He is ashamed of his sin.￻他為他的罪而感羞恥
￹`Ka~`ngodo~`an~ `ko~ `demak~ `nira~.￺The phrase has double meaning. 1. What he does is cause for respect / admiration. 2. What he did is shameful.￻這語句有雙重意義: 1. 他所作所為令人欽佩(尊敬，讚賞) 2. 他做了令人羞恥的事，他自取其辱
